text:
Prayagraj (formerly called as Allahabad), is a city in Uttar Pradesh state of India. It is located where Ganges and Yamuna rivers join. This city is a holy city for Hindus. It is best known for Kumbh fair. This fair occurs every 12th year in Prayagraj.
Previously Prayagraj known as Allahabad. The name has changed in Yogi Government Uttar Pradesh in 2018.
